<< OOC: Sigh. The Rock has been shoved down my throat and out my ass. It 
hurts to have to listen to him. RVD and Stone Cold are super talented, and 
Chris Kanyon and DDP are so incredible that you'll go blind if you try to 
watch a match featuring that numb and dumb Matt Hardy. I don't rank wrestlers 
on their mic skills. No offense, Unitron, please don't take this personally, 
but are you a mark? I have friends who are marks... >>

(The Rock hasn't been crammed.  He's earned all his dues.  Hell, he could've 
made millions playing as a pro football player if it weren't for an injury.  
A guy that can go from being a pro football player to the greatest wrestler 
in history is a man that deserves respect and recognition.  No WCW has ever 
done that, and never will.

Chris Kanyon and DDP? Heh, what a bunch of losers.  "It's me, it's me, it's 
DDP." Gee, that sounds a LOT like the Road Dogg ::cough:: rip off ::cough::  
And hey, dude, I said the only good talent in the Alliance comes from the 
former WWF stars in it.  I'm pretty sure Stone Cold was in the WWF.  Stone 
Cold has switched sides so many times it's just plain stupid.  Matt Hardy has 
more skill than DDP and Kanyon combined.  

The WCW and ECW crumbled.  The WWF stood tall and proud and kicking butt.  
Why?  WWF owns WCW and ECW.  The WWF is the master of ownage.  I don't know 
what a mark is, though in assassination terms it means I'm someone's target.  
So, hopefully, no I am not a mark.  I find today's slang idiotic and simply 
continues to devastate the English language.  But what I find interesting is 
you didn't respond to over two-thirds of what I said.)
